Notes: ID assigned by sites for patient, specifically for the Connect study

Question Text: Token generated by DCEG before the website visit or at sign-in.
Notes: Used to peronalized the sign-in URL and to track participant progress through the Connect workflows.  Passive recruits are assigned a token by the PWA after sign-in.

Question Text: Pin generated by DCEG prior to sign-in
Notes: Usesd by active recruits at sign-in if not signing in through a personalized URL

Question Text: Connect ID autogenerated when consent form submitted
Notes: The human readable Connect Study ID, serves as a compliment to the site Study IDs
